physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 14 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten signatures on the front of the photograph: ''H. G. Wilford, H. S. Philips, and Olivia Brinker.'' Handwritten signatures on the back of the photograph: ''Property of Olive Ruth Chernoff, Dorothy G. Leslie, Mildred M. Chutock, Agnes C. McCallum, Lucile Harward, Mary S. Hetinyer, Norma Hattinger, Mary E. Biggs, Alma Krusen, Maud L. Stevens, Shirley Hanson, Mary Steele, Jane Adele Williams, Majorie Stephenson, Mel Sheldon, Eleanor Marden, Margaret Michael, Julia Middlebrook, Isabel Bickel, Russell Smith, Shirley Hanson, Annabelle Weinberg, Stuart Sauerg, [illegible], Julia Goodson, Irving Isaacson ''Chunky,'' Lucile Segaudas, Lucia May Corine (Corny), Geremine McDonald, Wilma Brandt, Beth Chamberlain, Janet Reed, Gene Kelton, Budd Anderson (cousin), Edith, to my love, Louise Epperson, Clark Johnson, Hugh S. Corbin, Charles P. Barry, Marjorie Hitt, Anita [illegible], Jane Schayer, Janice Porter, Dorothy Cox, Arlene Ruth, Gene Kelton, Frances Robertson, Marguerite Wirz, Dorothy Laudale, Ethel Mooney, Evelyn Baldwin Young, Mary Louis, Helen-Virginia Donaldson, Major Stuff, Rodney Chamberlain, Aaron Gove Jr. High Donor, Debbie Greenfield.''

mods.abstract: A group of students posed with their teachers in front of Aaron Gove Junior High School located at Colorado Blvd and 14th Ave, Denver, Colorado. Most of the windows have been colored in except for the second story windows on the right where children are looking out. The following students signed the back of the photograph: Olive Ruth Chernoff, Dorothy G. Leslie, Mildred M. Chutock, Agnes C. McCallum, Lucile Harward, Mary S. Hetinyer, Norma Hattinger, Mary E. Biggs, Alma Krusen, Maud L. Stevens, Shirley Hanson, Mary Steele, Jane Adele Williams, Majorie Stephenson, Mel Sheldon, Eleanor Marden, Margaret Michael, Julia Middlebrook, Isabel Bickel, Russell Smith, Annabelle Weinberg, Stuart Sauerg, [illegible], Julia Goodson, Irving Isaacson ''Chunky,'' Lucile Segaudas, Lucia May Corine (Corny), Geremine McDonald, Wilma Brandt, Beth Chamberlain, Janet Reed, Gene Kelton, Budd Anderson (cousin), Edith, Louise Epperson, Clark Johnson, Hugh S. Corbin, Charles P. Barry, Marjorie Hitt, Anita [illegible], Jane Schayer, Janice Porter, Dorothy Cox, Arlene Ruth, Frances Robertson, Marguerite Wirz, Dorothy Laudale, Ethel Mooney, Evelyn Baldwin Young, Mary Louis, Helen-Virginia Donaldson, Major Stuff, Rodney Chamberlain. Olivia Brinker, H. G. Wilford, and H. S. Philips signed the front of the photograph.
